resources.string: While using any of your app which can share some url to other apps click on share button or menu item.
Select Add to your homescreen item from list of available target applications
There is no third step, the shortcut icon should be already on your homescreen

$cat about
This cool little app has been created by myself.
Really.
If you like it, please rate it on Google Play. If you dislike it do it so as well. Thank you!
Feature requests, bug reports, or whatever else except any kind of spam send on my email address.
Keep pinning!

What to display in sharing menu (Since lot of apps sorts this menu alphabeticaly, you can adjust the position, it will be displayed on, with this settings)
